attributes.action: Remove  Outdated BSL law breed - specific legislation from dangerous dog act
attributes.additional_details:
Remove BSL from the Dangerous Dog Act multiple cross breed dogs are being punished, PTS because of looks or held for months at high costs to local police forces in private costly kennels until a owner gets court date to prove dog is not a danger. 
Numerous animal charities are in agreement that this is wrong and a cruel part of the dangerous dog act BSL is not fit for purpose in 2024 and should be abolished so innocent look alike dogs don't lose their family and life
attributes.background:
Remove BSL from the dangerous dog act 
 killing dogs for looks is wrong there are multiple cross breed dogs that are seized that have never put a paw wrong and  PTS for looks alone 
Many dogs in 2024 share characteristics of many other breeds that does not make them automatically dangerous

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Scrap ban on dog breeds, regulate dog owners and ban euthanasia of healthy dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652050
